name: Tethered (itch) (zenpj)
description:
Ascend with a friend! Throw and pull your way to the top. Be careful not to let your friend fall or you'll follow!

Controls:

Left Stick - Move

X/Square - Pull chain

A/Cross - Throw

Tethered is a co-op platformer/climbing game inspired by games like Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy and Jump King. This demo is just for me to feel out if there's any interest in the game, if there is I'll work on an actual release, so let me know if you like it!

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER ONLY! TWO CONTROLLERS REQUIRED!

I recommend using Parsec to play over long distances!
